about_the_game:
AsiaKingdom is an exciting hidden object puzzle game in an Asian setting.
This game is a great way to relax after a hard day and get away from problems. Intuitive gameplay and a calm atmosphere does not bother the player and allows you to immediately immerse yourself in the process.
Melodious light music creates an atmosphere of tranquility and mystery in the game.
Some items will be easier to find. And some items will have to work hard to find! There are many objects on the location, there are numerous pavilions, fountains, bridges and other Asian decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.
